I enjoyed this better than the original HL. Great addition to the original story. You're fighting on the opposite side this time, with troops trying to catch freeman. Several radio discussions from the original HL are caught here too, you can figure out how some levels are happening in parallel with the plot from the base game.

New weapons are really cool. Now you can fight with Xen weapons. Also you discover new parts of the facility where experiments were being made with aliens.

I think I have to admit I enjoyed this one more than the original HL :). Game time on easy: around 7 hours.

Game is great
Retains the challenging puzzles, the adrenaline pumping action, and the rich story of Half-Life while being fresh and being its own game. 9/10

Would reccomend for Half Life fans but not entirely necessary for the series as a whole.

A mostly great game, with the classic Half Life gameplay we have come to known and love. With an okay story and an interesting new take on the Black Mesa event as seen from one of the many soldiers point of view. However the game does suffer from some glitches such as getting stuck in the floor and instantly dying with no cause and a horrible boss battle towards the end of the game.

CLAMP has outdone themselves yet again and given us a crappy anime. 

This time, spazes get theirs as loser farm boy Hideki gets to have some robot lovin'. 

The story follows an utter creepy wanker who gets a human-shaped computer, he does all sorts of adult things with it, but AH HA HA HA, she's not a real person--molestation is all right!! Then it learns to talk to him, so he can tell it all sorts of loser things and perv out on it because real girls won't touch his shorts with a ten-foot pole. The End. 

What a load of crock this was. 

The characters were DUMB. SERIOUSLY! Hideki has to be the most unexceptional guy ever to be animated. His one talent is being disgusting and bland but so stupid that everyone goes, 'Aw, he's so sweet.' He reminds me of a dog that keeps running into the door--aw, it's so cute. And Chii had NO PERSONALITY. I am sure moe fans loved her because all she did was stay half-naked and go 'Chii~' Right. I can't understand why any girl would like this. What lesson is this teaching? Girls, the only way a guy would like you is you stay in your underwear and say only one word to him! Preferably that one word will be 'Panty'. 

The only fabulous thing about this was the music. The OP rocks. Other than that, this was an unfabulous trash pile of an anime.

The best expansion for a game I've  played
game is realy fun

Opossing force, la primera expansion oficial para half life nos relata la historia del cabo shepard que fue enviado a black mesa durante los eventos ocurridos en el juego base.

Más que una expansion puedo atreverme a decir que el titulo lo tiene todo para ser un juego diferente, incluye nuevas armas y enemigos, aumentando la variedad de las armas vistas en half life ( aunque hay armas del juego original que tampoco lograremos manipular )

La dificultad se hace verdaderamente un reto en dificil con los nuevos enemigos que superan por mucho los vistos anteriormente, estos nuevos enemigos tienen mucha mayor resistencia, velocidad y tienen armas a distancia que son dificiles de esquivar. en lo personal el juego tuvo su desafio y me gusto mucho.

El juego esta en ingles, pero si buscas en internet puedes encontrar rapidamente los archivos para poner el juego con voces en español. este titulo viene con muchisimas novedades y tienes una vision diferente de lo que ocurre en black mesa, jugar como uno de los personajes "malos" de half life no te deja las cosas faciles. hay que recordar que hay otro equipo gubernamental que tuvo una pequeña participacion en half life pero que en esta expansion nos hace la vida imposible, me refiero a los comandos negros, que son desplegados cuando los soldados como shepard fueron sobrepasados por los alienigenas.

La cosa se equilibra un poco con la posibilidad de aliarse a los demas militares, estos tienen habilidades unicas tales como abrir puertas o un medico que funciona igual que un cargador de vida. estos aliados npc te siguen con mayor velocidad que lo hacian los cientificos del half life, sin embargo no todo lo que brilla es oro, como siempre hay que estar cada tanto asegurandose que te esten siguendo para poder usarlos mas adelante o que te den fuego de cobertura.

Lo recomiendo, es una expansion que no te deja con gusto a poco o un mal sabor, si aun no has jugado ninguna expansion recomiendo empezar con blue shift ya que es mucho más corta y con menos innovacion, asi despues juegas esta y terminas con broche de oro la saga original.

A Half-Life expansion pack that lets you see through the eyes of an enemy: Corporal Adrian Shepard. A military individual that had a terrible time over at the facility. Make it through Black Mesa and see what dangers lie ahead.

Если вам понравилась оригинальная Half-Life, то обязательно сыграйте и в Half-Life: Opposing Force. Вы снова увидите знакомые локации, но на этот раз глазами Адриана Шепарда - бойца спецподразделения HECU, перед которым ставится задача ликвидировать участников и свидетелей инцидента в Чёрной Мезе. Однако Шепард с самого начала игры оказывается в одной лодке с научным персоналом Чёрной Мезы, преследуя лишь одну цель - выбраться живым из злополучного комплекса.

В игре вам доведётся пройтись по тем же местам, где был Гордон Фримен (однажды ваши пути даже на мгновение пересекутся). Вам также доведётся увидеть, как один из командиров HECU отдаёт по радио приказ "Forget about Freeman", который вы слышали, играя за Фримена. И это еще далеко не все отсылки к оригинальной Half-Life.

Opposing Force также привносит немало новых видов оружия (особенно стоит отметить ручного барнакла и пушку для перемещения в Зен), а также новых врагов.

В остальном это всё та же добротная Half-Life, пусть и с немного более короткой сюжетной линией.

Excellent expension pack pour Half-Life en 1999.

Il offre le point de vue d'un militaire, Adrian Shepard, parti "normalement" nettoyer Black Mesa au moment où Gordon a foiré l'expérience. Évidemment, il faut avoir jouer au premier pour comprendre. Il dure environ 4-5h.

J'ai trouvé l'histoire assez sympa, dans le thème, sachant que ça n'avait pas été développé par Valve à l'époque, mais par GearBox, une entreprise de jeu fidèle à sa réputation de l'époque ( je crois que de nos jours, ce n'est plus la même chose... ). 

Vous avez le choix entre tuer tout le monde ou pas, ça n'a pas d'influance sur l'histoire, évitez quand même de zigouiller vos potes militaires, car eux sont tous autant très utiles les uns que les autres, vous avez des médecins, des ingénieurs ( capitaux pour ouvrir les portes pour progresser dans l'histoire ) et des mitrailleurs, sans compter des shotgunners et des riflers. C'est une IA très basique, elle est un peu dure d'oreille pour suivre, mais ça va, pas trop de difficulté, le pathfinder est correct.

La variété d'armes est identique au premier, avec l'addition d'un grappin/variante de l'arme abeille alien, et une variante du revolver. Les ennemis aussi ont quelques variantes, et le pack HD pour armes offre une toute autre alternative pour toutes les armes, ce qui est vachement bien pour un DLC de 1999.

Certains puzzles sont en revanche mal expliqués, il faut bien réfléchir avant d'agir, sinon on fonce droit dans le mur, il y a de la créativité pour vaincre certains ennemis, et le grappin donne un peu de platforming. 

Au niveau de la difficulté, ouaip, les ennemis sont deux fois plus forts, il y en a des nouveaux beaucoup plus difficiles, la vie et l'armure descendent très rapidement si vous ne faites pas gaffe, sachant que c'est assez logique ; vous n'êtes pas Gordon, vous n'avez pas sa précieuse armure.

Autrement, un très bon élément dans la collection Half-Life, la soundtrack n'est pas le point fort du jeu, mais il y a quelques instants où le jeu vous indique certains moments clés via les musiques, mais ça s'arrête à ça.

Si un jour, un remake se fait de ce jeu, ça serait que du bonheur, c'est un jeu que je recommande à 100% pour tout les fans de la série.

This expansion is a nice complement to Half-Life.  You play as the soldiers who were sent to Black-Mesa and it shows what happened to them after Freeman left to Xen.  You get to fight new tougher aliens, use stronger weapons, and gain help from fellow soldiers.  The pacing is great and you'll have fun while returning to Black Mesa.

Ну такое, буду честен. Все обещали, что это "взгляд со стороны" на оригинальный Half-Life. Начало и правда доставляло. Сперва военная подготовка в тренеровочном уровне, потом с вертолета сразу видим локацию, по которой мы лазали Фрименом, нас сбивают и...и сюжет на этом кончается, дальше мы всю игру лазаем по вентиляциям, зачищаем Чёрных оперативников, которые уже Нас пытаются зачистить. Ну и финал через 4 часа, повторяющий оригинал. Да еще и с таким же намеком на продолжение, которого судя по всему никогда не будет.

Игру можно посоветовать большим фанатам ХЛ. А так, без продолжения в ней нет смысла.
Ах да, еще тут есть застревание в полу лифта и слетающий сейф, который крашит игру

[h1]"Atando cabos sueltos"[/h1]

Half-Life 1: Opposing Force es la primera expansión del Half-Life original lanzada por Valve en 1999. En esta expansión encarnaremos el papel de un cabo del ejercito de los Estados Unidos perteneciente a una división especial llamada H.E.C.U ([i]Hazardous Environment Combat Unit[/i]), en donde se nos asgina la tarea en conjunto con nuestra escuadra de "silenciar" a los posibles testigos del accidente producido en "Black Mesa" por la cascada de resonancias.

Al igual que "Half-Life 1" y "Blue Shift" no presenta banda sonora, no hay mejoras gráficas notables, salvo algunos retexturizados en algunos enemigos o zonas especificas.
Sin embargo, dispondremos de 2 armas a melé y 5 armas de fuego nuevas (y algunas reemplazan a armas de caracteristicas similares), y sobre todo un "gancho lapa" que no hubiera venido mal que lo hubiesen implementado en las anteriores entregas de la saga.

Me he topado con algunos bugs en cuanto a la posición de personaje, estar estancado en ductos de ventilación, ascensores y plataformas que me han hecho reiniciar decenas de veces la partida, pero nada que no se pueda arreglar.

Bastante más largo que la 2da expansión, durando una media de 1 hora y 30 min, perfecto para pasar una tarde.

HALF-LIFE: OPPOSING FORCE<

The second installment in the half-life series is the progeny of valve teaming with gearbox. The game was a smash hit for fans of the original and brought some new elements to the playing field. The plot takes place during the second half of half-life and Instead of playing as gordon freeman, you play as the ordinary soldier Adrian Shephard. The story also has some new faces, good and bad.

PROS:
-The story is very well paced and put together very nicely. You play as Adrian Shephard during the cover up operation of the black mesa incident hunting down that dreaded gordon freeman. Not spoiling the rest in case you haven't picked up a copy in the 20 years its existed.
-The environment is very immersive as it is a long seamless road to the end of the game with, as the definition of seamless implies, zero cutscenes or immersion breaking interruptions.
-The gunplay involves the same weapons from half-life with plentiful new additions. The arsenal available is pleasently loud, very powerful feeling, and quite fun to use when eliminating the enemy.
-The ending is good for what it is, it isn't news but spoiler alert [spoiler] no sequal [/spoiler].
-Has an HD reskin to give a fresh coat of paint.

CONS: (Not even half-life is safe from sin, sorry) Please note that i am extremely aware that this game is an oldy.
-Controls feel floaty and thats not very great to say when this game is a puzzle platformer.
-Same issues as the original, guns feel not very effective at some times and very effective at others. No idea whats going on here but it hasn't deterred me from playing. Also a specific enemy is very grenade happy, you'll know it when the time comes.

This game isn't too much of a must have as the original but usually it comes bundled with it so give it a play(used to come free). I picked the entire series up in a frantic buy in a summer sale and it was worth it. if anything it's textures for gmod if you don't have much interest in it.

Игра предлагает сыграть за капрала Адриана Шепарда, солдата спецподразделения HECU. Попробуйте оказатся в роли отряда зачистки из оригинальной игры и попробуйте взглянуть на знакомые события с другой стороны.  Из нововведений стоит отметить систему отрядов и отдачу приказов, кучу новго оружия (включая инопланетное) + новые виды пришельцев. Фанатам серии оригинальной игры строго рекомендовано к ознакомлению.

Interesting companion piece to the original [i]Half-Life[/i]. I'd say this is a slightly more consistent experience than the original game in terms of level design (I'm looking at you [i]On a Rail[/i]) but it also never reaches those highs that [i]Half-Life[/i] often did and I think the choice of focusing more on combat, which was one of the weaker aspects of [i]Half-Life[/i], is a mistake even if it makes sense thematically. Still, this is an overall enjoyable game/expansion.
What can I say, it is a Half-Life Game and it is Awesome as are the rest of the Half-Life Series!

События по ту сторону Блек Мезы

Its an old game made before game devs were more focused on making money than quality content, so its good and inexpensive. It does have puzzles so if you really hate puzzles and/or really dont want to figure out how to shut off the power to a fence you have to crawl through, probably wont mind it too much theres not many puzzles. The graphics arent amazing compared to the modern $60 game, but honestly this game makes up for it four times over. Ive spent a good amount of time on this game and I have yet to see it crash or suffer from a game breaking bug/glitch. Dont worry about it being called an expansion to Half-Life 1 you dont need to own or have Half-Life 1 installed to play Half-Life: Opposing Force. It has SUPER quick loading sequences. Its a great game, you'd be missing out on something great to not buy this. With all this in mind combined with the fact it brings 3-5 hours of enjoyable gameplay while only costing $4.99 I have to say it comes out with a solid 10/10.
O melhor Dlc de Half Life recomendo

A jogabilidade e o motor gráfico são os mesmos de Half-Life, assim como os quebra-cabeças e inimigos presentes. Nesta história, você controla o Cabo Adrian Shephard, do Corpo de Fuzileiros Navais dos EUA, que tem como objetivo eliminar as evidências do acidente em Black Mesa. Porém, ao ser atacado por alienígenas de Xen, Adrian precisa lutar por sua vida e impedir a todo o custo que o Dr. Gordon Freeman escape das instalações.

I liked helping my fellow marines and the Black Mesa security guards fight through the facility. I had a good time with this game, definitly check it out if it sounds like your kind of gig.

The attack on Pearl Harbor was a surprise military strike by the Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii Territory, on the morning of December 7, 1941. The attack, also known as the Battle of Pearl Harbor, led to the United States' entry into World War II. The Japanese military leadership referred to the attack as the Hawaii Operation and Operation AI, and as Operation Z during its planning.

Japan intended the attack as a preventive action to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions they planned in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States. Over the next seven hours there were coordinated Japanese attacks on the U.S.-held Philippines, Guam and Wake Island and on the British Empire in Malaya, Singapore, and Hong Kong.

The attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time. The base was attacked by 353[15] Imperial Japanese fighter planes, bombers, and torpedo planes in two waves, launched from six aircraft carriers. All eight U.S. Navy battleships were damaged, with four sunk. All but the USS Arizona were later raised, and six were returned to service and went on to fight in the war. The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship,[nb 4] and one minelayer. 188 U.S. aircraft were destroyed; 2,403 Americans were killed and 1,178 others were wounded. Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the submarine piers and headquarters building (also home of the intelligence section) were not attacked. Japanese losses were light: 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost, and 64 servicemen killed. One Japanese sailor, Kazuo Sakamaki, was captured.

The surprise attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters. The following day, December 8, the United States declared war on Japan,[18][19] and several days later, on December 11, Germany and Italy declared war on the U.S. The U.S. responded with a declaration of war against Germany and Italy. Domestic support for non-interventionism, which had been fading since the Fall of France in 1940, disappeared.

There were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action by Japan, but the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, "a date which will live in infamy". Because the attack happened without a declaration of war and without explicit warning, the attack on Pearl Harbor was later judged in the Tokyo Trials to be a war crime.

[/list]

Ci giocavo tanto anni fa e ogni tanto negli ultimi precedenti. Se ti piace half life 1 questa espansione non ti può mancare alla lista. Non c'è bisogno che spieghi ogni cosa riguardo le armi, campagna etc basta leggere le altre recensioni o ricercare su google. Posso solo dire che anni fa il multiplayer era molto popolato (non quanto quello di hl1) però ci si divertiva un sacco, server deathmatch, team deathmatch, cattura la bandiera, cooperativa (ora puoi giocare sven coop per questo) e tante altre cose create pure dalla community. Ora al massimo ci giocano in 3 gatti ma consiglio ugualmente di provarlo. Ricordo ancora quando entravo nei server coop e c'erano i giocatori normali, poi quelli che facevano speedrun, e infine quelli che trollavano tipo bloccando le porte e quant'altro. Questo gioco mi ha donato tanto divertimento e lo ricorderò per sempre.

hl 3

Opposing Force gives you the opportunity to be part of the military from the original Half-Life! You experience the struggles of the soldiers in Black Mesa and fight new enemies never seen before in the original. This is a must buy for Half-Life fans!

Half-Life: Opposing Force to pierwszy samodzielny dodatek do Half-Life, za które odpowiedzialne jest Gearbox Software. Gra powstała w 1999 roku i opowiada nam wydarzenia po przeciwnej stronie barykady z perspektywy Adriana Shepharda, jednego z żołnierzy HECU, którzy zostali wysłani przez rząd by wyeliminować zagrożenie oraz wyciszyć całą sytuacje. Więcej nie zdradze, bo lepiej samemu poznać fabułe co nie? Gra od podstawki różni się całkiem sporo, mamy nieco nowej broni, nowych przeciwników oraz gra wyjaśnia nam po części parę kwestii no i dopowiada nieco nowej, gdzie w Blue Shift tego nie doznaliśmy. Poziomy są też całkiem ciekawe, odwiedzimy parę znanych miejsc z podstawki, a gra mniej skupia się na wymiarze Xen, tylko na placówce badawczej, więc rzadko zajrzymy do wymiaru kosmitów. Moja ocena to 8,5/10, gra nie tylko wyjaśnia parę spraw z podstawki, ale też wprowadza nowe rzeczy, ten dodatek lepiej wyszedł niż Blue Shift, no i oczywiście polecam.
